gui.hardcorerevival.wait_for_rescue: Wait to be rescued or accept your fate.
config.hardcorerevival.maxDeathTicks.too: The time in ticks in which a player can still be rescued from death. 20 ticks are one second.
config.hardcorerevival.maxRescueDist.too: The distance at which a player can rescue another.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueTime.toolti: The time in ticks it takes to rescue a player. 20 ticks are one second.
config.hardcorerevival.disableDeathTimer: Set to true to completely disable the death timer, meaning you will have infinite time to save others.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueRespawnHeal: The amount of health to respawn with when a player was rescued, out of 20.
config.hardcorerevival.rescueRespawnFood: The food level to respawn with when a player was rescued, out of 20.
